title: Major Legal Win for President Trump
itunes:title: Major Legal Win for President Trump
description: A federal judge yesterday granted President Trump's request for an independent special master. The special master will be a third-party assigned to review evidence seized by the FBI in their raid on Trump's Mar-a-Lago home that may be covered by executive privilege or attorney-client privilege. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break down the ruling and what it means for the case moving forward. This and more today on Sekulow.
